metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45960 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.3, a left shift by 29 (or more) places in the storeAtts function in xmlparse.c can lead to realloc misbehavior (e.g., allocating too few bytes, or only freeing memory).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm2
lib64expat1 - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm2
libexpat1 - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: sbeattie> paraview uses system expat xotcl uses system expat poco uses system expat gdcm uses system expat audacity uses system expat simgear uses system expat coin3 uses system expat as of 4.0.0~CMake~6f54f1602475+ds1-1 sitecopy uses system expat since 1:0.16.0-1 (dapper!) rodrigo-zaiden> libxmltok does not include nsAttsPower, so, not affected.

criterions.comment: ayttm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
cableswig package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
coin3 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
expat package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm2').
firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
insighttoolkit package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
vnc4 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.

wbxml2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
xmlrpc-c package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
